description.value: Pre-adopt of the `MedicationStatement.renderedDosageInstructions` concept from FHIR R5. It provides a full representation of the dose of the medication included in all dosage instructions. To be used when multiple dosage instructions are included to represent complex dosing such as increasing or tapering doses.

purpose.value: This StructureDefinition defines a pre-adopt extension, aligning with the [version conversion extension pattern in the FHIR specification](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/versions.html#extensions). The `Extension.url` is intentionally set to the HL7 base. This approach aims to minimize the need for implementation changes. Upon the 'official' release of HL7's cross-version extensions, this definition will be deprecated and replaced by a direct dependency on those extensions.

definition.value: Pre-adopt from FHIR R5 of the `MedicationStatement.renderedDosageInstruction` element.

The full representation of the dose of the medication included in all dosage instructions. To be used when multiple dosage instructions are included to represent complex dosing such as increasing or tapering doses.

comment.value: The content of the rendered dosage instruction must not be different from the dose represented in the dosage instructions content.
